children.text:
[Daily Heart]
- Attendance heart, a heart received from friends, Hot Time login
- 5 hearts received for watching video advertisement


[Ever Heart]
1. Watch a video advertisement. (unlimited)
- 5 Daily Hearts and 5 Ever Hearts awarded

2. Refill at the Heart Refill Station

3. Heart Box
- The excitement of not knowing how many you will get!
- Best way to save up hearts!!

4. Invite friends!
- Your friends will have to input your nickname in the recommender field when they sign up.
- 1,000 hearts

5. Post a comment with a high definition image on the community!
- 50 hearts for each post, maximum of 2 per day
- Extra 50 hearts during Hot Time! (1 time)

6. Receive more than 100 hearts on a post in the community!
 - 10% of hearts received on posts as well as votes will be included in the tally for the artist~

7. Receive hearts again for comments / sharing~
 - 5
